alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Bacon; Coffee; Pierce; Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 12 at 10:54PM EDT until October 12 at 11:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Coffee County in southeastern Georgia... West central Pierce County in southeastern Georgia... Southeastern Atkinson County in southeastern Georgia... Northwestern Ware County in southeastern Georgia... South central Bacon County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 1130 PM EDT. * At 1054 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northeast of Cogdell, or 13 miles north of Argyle, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Waycross, Jamestown, Pebble Hill, Dixie Union, Millwood and Bickley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
